subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Down three games to one to the Indians in the A.L.C.S., Red Sox slugger Manny Ramírez discussed Boston’s potential mortality in a casual way, saying “It’s not like the end of the world.”
snippet: Down three games to one to the Indians in the A.L.C.S., Red Sox slugger Manny Ramírez discussed Boston’s potential mortality in a casual way, saying “It’s not like the end of the world.”
